name: Spaceman Bubble Float - PRO - out of this world pop shooter
name_original: Spaceman Bubble Float - PRO - out of this world pop shooter
description:
Welcome to your next bubble popping addiction!
Whether you want to puzzle your way through many challenging levels, or just to pop on as long as you can in an endless score-collecting flow, look no further than this gorgeous game!

* This PRO game has no pop-up ads!
* Extremely fun, challenging and addictive
* 120 Adventure levels
* Choose Puzzle or Endless mode
* Stunning graphics
* Simple controls

Light Sleepers is an independent crew of new media artists, experienced and highly professional, passionate about creating high-quality entertainment.

Visit us: www.light-sleepers.com
Like us: www.facebook.com/light.sleepers.5
